blog.name: avengers-nextgen
blog.title: Avengers Next Generation
blog.description: A blog that is dedicated to the Avengers kids based on my ships!!!

body:
Master Post

@buckyeahavengersworld I hope this helps. I excluded a lot of the shit posts 😂For those of you who are new and aren’t sure where to start I give you a Master Post. This is a run down of everything on the blog with links at your disposal. You can explore however you’d like!

— — —

Avengers Run Down:

Ships:

Steve/ Natasha

Pepper/Tony

Vision/Wanda

T’Challa/Nikia

Scott/Hope

Phase 1 Kids:

Alex Rogers

James Rogers

Piper Stark

Bianca Barnes

Scout Maximoff

Thalia Odin

Sage Laufeyson

Siyanda

Orion Quill

Phase 2 Kids:

Enzo Laufeyson

Penelope (Penny) Lang

Arthur Strange

Chloe Strange

Fox Duran

Phase 1 Fics:

This one is the last chapter but it has links to the rest: Redemption

The Rise of the Lost:

Prologue Part I Part 2 Part 3 Part 4 Part 5 Part 6 Part 7 Part 8 Part 9 Part 10 Part 11 Part 12 Part 13 Part 14 Part 15 Part 16 Part 17 Part 18 Part 19 1 & 2

Short Stories and Bonus Plot Points in order of publishing date:

The First Suit

The Kids’ First Meetings With One Another

The Truth Behind Containment

High School

The Fox in the Gutter

Everything Is A Lie

Play Your Cards Carefully

High School the Dance: Part 1 Part 2

Wakanda Arrives

Protective Nathaniel

The Kids’ Fears

First Impressions on Orion

Sexual Tension on Missions

Trivia Night

Everything Would Be Okay

‘Tis a Mistake to Love Her

Pjo and Avengers Next Gen Cross Over

Father’s Day

Some More Highschool Stuff

Did You See Her Vanish?

The Kids’ Exes

There Is Another

Are You Virginian?

Kinks…

Cute Nathaniel/Ellie Smut

Heroes’ Journal: Entry 1 Entry 2

Interview Sessions: Session 1 Session 2 Session 3 Session 4

Things A Girl Learns

Ways to Relax

Fics Bridging The Gap Between Phases One and Two:

The Year Between: Part 1 Part 2 Part 3 Part 4 Part 5 Part 6

Phase 2 Kid facts:

Fun facts

Past Relationships

Height and Languages!

summary: Last night me and my family watched Infinity War again and today my mum was like god that was such a bad movie I'm gonna watch...
body: Last night me and my family watched Infinity War again and today my mum was like god that was such a bad movie I’m gonna watch the one that came before it that was good so my sister asked if it was civil war and my mum was like NO???? The one with Thor. Needless to say my mum has great taste

reblog.comment: Last night me and my family watched Infinity War again and today my mum was like god that was such a bad movie I’m gonna watch the one that came before it that was good so my sister asked if it was civil war and my mum was like NO???? The one with Thor. Needless to say my mum has great taste

summary: When I saw the Marvel intro™ and heard the music, I thought that everything will be fine. My hopes were turned to dust. (See...
body: When I saw the Marvel intro™ and heard the music, I thought that everything will be fine. My hopes were turned to dust. (See what I did there? It’s too soon, I know, but I had to.)

summary: a lot of people are probably thinking about when deadpool was stuck with madcap
question: a lot of people are probably thinking about when deadpool was stuck with madcap
answer:
or as i like to call it “that time when the writers(Daniel Way *cough cough*) decided to give Wade more extreme case of split personality, and when it wasnt needed  anymore other writers had to think up a reason why was it there in the first place and how to get rid of it”… 

But yeah…. 2008s run and the way too zany whitebox of right hemisphere/insanity/Madcap……. *shakes fist* 

Although it is still entertaining.. if its not dumb overkill

reblog.comment:

But yeah…. 2008s run and the way too zany whitebox of right hemisphere/insanity/Madcap……. *shakes fist*

summary:
So yesterday was my 17th birthday lmao
And all I asked for was my missing Marvel movies because duh I'm a huge Marvel Fanatic
I...
body:
So yesterday was my 17th birthday lmao

And all I asked for was my missing Marvel movies because duh I’m a huge Marvel Fanatic

I got what I asked for and I can’t believe I have all 18 movies except Infinity War

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)
